Welcome to Customer Relation Management’s Documentation!¶

Welcome to the official documentation for the Customer Relation Management (CRM) project. This documentation provides detailed information about the CRM system, its components, and how to use them effectively.

class:

dual-content-right

  • Index

  • Module Index

  • Search Page

The CRM system is designed to help businesses manage customer relationships and streamline various processes. This section provides an overview of the system’s features, benefits, and how it can be tailored to meet specific business needs.

If you’re new to CRM, our Quick Start Guide will walk you through the setup process, user management, and essential tasks to get you started quickly.

Learn how to customize the CRM system according to your business requirements. This section covers custom fields, workflow automation, and integration with other tools.

Explore advanced features such as analytics, reporting, and user permissions. Dive into in-depth guides on utilizing CRM’s full potential for your organization.

If you encounter any issues or have questions, our support section provides resources to help you troubleshoot problems and get assistance from our team.

Interested in contributing to CRM’s development? Find out how you can get involved, submit bug reports, and contribute to the project’s growth.

Stay up-to-date with the latest features, improvements, and bug fixes by reading our release notes. Each version update is documented here for your reference.
